summary: Makes using Candlelight and Magelight spells much easier.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][color=#F5C908][b]Magic Lighting Convenience[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]Cast Candlelight and Magelight with a keystroke[/size][/center]

[color=#F5C908][heading]Description[/heading][/color]
This is a very simple mod that makes using Candlelight and Magelight spells much easier.

You no longer have to select the Candlelight spell, cast it, and switch back to whatever spell or weapon you had before. Just press a hotkey to toggle Candlelight on or off (default = [ ). It is automatically recast every minute and it will be instantly dispelled if turned off.

You can also instantly cast the Magelight spell simply by striking a hotkey (default = ]).

[color=#F5C908][heading]Features[/heading][/color]
[list][*]Toggle Candlelight spell off and on[*]Automatic recasting[*]Dispell on command[*]Send Magelight missile with 1 keystroke[*]Never have to disarm to improve lighting[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Requirements[/heading][/color]
[list][*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE 1.7.1[/url][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url][/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Compatibility[/heading][/color]
[list][*]Fully compatible with DLC and 3rd party mods.[*]No known conflicts.[*]Any load order works.[*]Hot keys are remappable to avoid conflicts.[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Game Safe[/heading][/color]
[list][*]Adds no scripts to objects.[*]Safely and easily remove at any time.[*]No game bloat.[/list]

[color=#F5C908][heading]Other Great Mods from Jaxonz[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583]Positioner[/url]: The decorator's most powerful tool to accurately and easily move/copy/scale any object in-game.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335]Renamer[/url]: Easily rename objects, equipment, containers, people, creatures, horses, pets, player homes, and just about anything.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52927]Smart Looter[/url]: Automatically gathers the good stuff and leaves the junk, allowing you to focus on the adventure.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53641]Blink Teleport[/url]: Amazingly powerful and fun! Blip to anywhere in the blink of an eye.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56545]Subtle Cloak Graphics[/url]: Be able to actually see when using a flame/frost/lightning cloak.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55474]Lights Please[/url]: Easily use magical lighting spells without disarming.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53365]Archery Focus[/url]: Automatically helps you aim when using bows and crossbows.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53268]Archery Perks[/url]: Adds tracer shots and automated arrow collection to the archery perk tree.
[/list]
All Jaxonz mods are stable and extremely high quality, coded by professionals.
